synopsis.text: After her band breaks up, Lucy falls into a meaningless routine. That changes when she meets her cousin Lucifer and his bandmate Ibaraki Doji, who recruit her into their indie band the Wicked Pistols. Lucifer dreams of propelling the band to stardom by winning a major music competition called Monsters Rock. Initially skeptical, Lucy has a change of heart after a pivotal event. This special anime episode follows Lucy's journey from disillusioned former band member to finding new musical purpose with her cousin's quirky band. Despite past disappointments, she may discover that making music can still be worthwhile, especially alongside family.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
